Claim: "Children are playing a video game together."
Implication: "The kids are indoors playing a video game."
Referring expressions: Children, video game, together  The kids, video game
Formula: (exists c (exists b (IsPlaying(b) and IsTogether(b,c))) & (forall f (forall e (forall g ( IsIndoors(e) ->   IsTogether(f,g)))))) -> (exists a (exists d (IsIndoors(d) and IsPlaying(a))))
